column4: Is it possible to run Ubuntu on a PC with a P2 350mHz CPU and 128mb RAM?
it might be, i would recomment trying with xubuntu or nubuntu, or if you got the know how, install server and install a minimal wm/de from command line
for what its worth, i did a server install of 5.10 and installed xfce/xubuntu on my amd k6 450mhz, 128mb ram laptop a while ago
